source.citation: Bertone, F. & Manzone, M. 2025. Productivity and costs of a tracked excavator-based processor at the cable yarder landing in the North-western Italian Alps. International Journal of Forest Engineering 36(1):67-75.
source.document: notes/reference/Productivity and costs of a tracked excavator-based processor at the cable yarder landing in the North-western Italian Alps.pdf
notes: Field study of a Hyundai R210LC-9 tracked excavator with a Keto Forst processor head working at a cable-yard landing in Picea abies (100 trees, 0.2–2.5 m³).
Mean delay-free cycle = 131.4 s (moving 1%, positioning 5%, processing 21%, stacking 19%, clearing 6%); total cycle with delays = 254.2 s (48% wait-for-yarders).
Delay-free productivity 25.9 m³/PMH, observed 14.8 m³/SMH; mean fuel 16.5 L/SMH (1.1 L/m³); cost 103.46 EUR/SMH (≈4.95 EUR/m³) in 2023 euros.
